dagtex 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

DAG basics

dagtex()

Create a new DAG

add_node()

Add a single node to a DAG

add_many_nodes()

Add several nodes

add_swig_node()

Create a split node for a SWIG

add_edge() add_curved_edge()

Add a single edge between two nodes in a DAG

add_many_edges()

Add several edges at once to a DAG

annotate_edge()

Add text to an edge.

save_dag()

Save the DAG image

Quick build tools

complete_dag()

Turn DAG into a complete DAG

swigify()

Turn a DAG into a SWIG

adorn_counterfactuals()

Add counterfactual notation to SWIG

Helper functions

get_latex_code()

Get LaTeX code

install_swigs() use_swigs()

Install Thomas Richardson's tikz library for drawing SWIGs

print_ids()

Print the numeric ids of the nodes

Contents
